Class: Requestor

Requestor

Requestor

new Requestor(log, desc, desc, desc, options, callback)

Method object for requests to the authentication server

Parameters:
Name Type Description
log function

the log from the original request
desc string

the request description for log and error messages
desc method

the request method
desc uri

the request URI
options object

the request options (NOT the strategy options!)
callback function

the callback
